author: AJ Lopez
comment: Love this app. Is the backbone communication of my company

author: Wilson Wong
comment: Please fix the app. When I open the app, it keeps break down.

author: Mohsin Buledi
comment: This app is full of bugs and doesn't work properly. I tried to re install and when i am trying to put secuity it starts again n sends me another code so now i cant even sign in
Does not even work in the first place. Cannot sign up at  all.

author: Donn Giles
comment: Will go back to 5 stars when it works again. Has not worked since the last update on my android. I've sent multiple bug reports and I'm hoping for a quick fix.
title: Easy tool for communication

author: Bob Epstein
comment: Best for people out in the world.
title: Perfect

author: Robert Piston
comment: Orthopaedic Surgeon: this app is secure and fast. We all love using this HIPPA compliant software in our practice!
title: RP

author: Samantha Gallagher
comment: The app is fine except it makes my phone vibrate with the notification icon. My phone is set to NEVER vibrate. Yet this app notifies me of a message by vibrating, blinking, and the icon. At all hours! I want to decide when and how I'm notified. The support solution was to turn off notifications. Sort of defeats the purpose of the app.

reply.author: Zinc, Inc.
reply.content: Hey Samantha sorry to hear you're having this issue. We'd love to help troubleshoot, please reach out to us by visiting: zinc.to/zincteam

title: Notifications

author: Angela Bryant-Brown
comment: What a great and efficient way to communicate with a group.
title: Love it!

author: Tyler Hagel
comment: Love it for comunicating with my coworkers.
title: Very Handy

author: Ahmad Bassouni
comment: Unbelievable app

author: Stephan Arnold
comment: Gr8 apps... very useful...!!!
title: Love It...!!!

author: Mike Muff
comment: *Take note of the second half of this" I really like Cotap for the most part, it is an awesome platform for communicating within an organization and sharing items. The problem is that for some reason, the app will just decide to stop notifying me when I am messaged, which really hinders my ability to be the leader my organization needs me to be.   I reached out to customer support and at first they seemed very helpful and involved, but they could not find a solution and promised me they would reach back out to me, but they never did. I understand that the notification problem might be my phone causing issues, but as somebody who is specialized in marketing/customer service, I find this customer service unacceptable. If customer service were to show greater effort, I would much more likely to give a higher rating, but poor customer service is a big problem with an app.

author: Paul Carpenter
comment: Fully functional, great features and easy to use. Give it a try!
title: Great App for Business

author: Jay Killeen
comment: Wish it was used by more people
title: Works great

author: Clarence Ku
comment: CONSULTANT

author: Richard Butler Jr
comment: Great
title: CoTap is great

author: Barrie Mort
comment: Cool little whatsapp type messenging app for work. Works across all browsers. Haven't used it enough to give 5 stars yet...
title: Good little messaging app

author: Tyvern Veras
comment: I love this app. I use it religiously with my IT team. We are always informed with this app of any sudden changes.
title: Fast, Efficient, User Friendly!

author: Simon Pollard
comment: Cotap creates an all new way of communicating at work. Apps like WhatsApp and Viber are not designed for business communication.
title: Great app for business communication

author: tom gravelin
comment: This app has been great for connecting our service teams that are in the field with the support teams back at the factory.
title: Good Team Chat Tool

author: Jose Sanchez
comment: Easy to use and have no issues.  Like that we can create groups for specific projects and we all chat there.
title: Great!

author: George Caldwell
comment: Secure way to communicate with your coworkers.
title: Great for business

author: ruth zuniga
comment: Love it!
title: Great App

author: stuartdonaldson1
comment: I have just started to use cotap and found it easy to set up and add Ci workers.  So far so good.
title: Easy to use

author: Ravindra Melkote
comment: Great for companies who have people working outside. It's a complete office you go out with.
title: Business chats

author: David-Georges Abecassis
comment: Easy to use. Clean interface.  I like
title: Very useful app

author: James Park
comment: Easy to stay in touch
title: Works great

author: Craig Skipsey
comment: This is the future of communication at work.  CoTap messages get replied to almost instantly.  Can't wait to see what this app can do as it develops further.  This is the new Yammer!
title: Frictionless communication app

author: Kalyan Kumar Reddy
comment: I like it more as I keep using it.
title: Breeze to use

author: Scott Jansz
comment: Explained the problems I was having in description & the developers were quick to identify & address the issues I was having. Thrilled with the level of service couldn't ask for more.

reply.author: Zinc, Inc.
reply.content: Scott, sorry to hear about your experience. If you have a Sony phone we had some issues which were addressed in the latest release. I would encourage you to reach out to us at http://cotap.me/teamcotap and let us know if you are still having issues. We will do our best to quickly fix them. Thanks!

title: Works well with brilliant support

author: Deon Kruger
comment: Cant change the ringtone...?  The new 'shortcut' tabs/icons below the input field always messes with the text input and is very easy to accidentally hit, causing frustration.

author: Terence Chan
comment: Resource draining app. Somehow this app takes more resources than more commonly used communication applications like WhatsApp and WeChat, but with less frequent usage and with fewer features.

reply.author: Zinc, Inc.
reply.content: Terence, thanks for the feedback. Do you mind reaching out to http://cotap.me/teamcotap and letting us know which resources you see our app using up? Do you see a battery issue? Or is it network data? We would love to try and address them. Thanks!

author: Vivek Dangi
comment: Now current version near to perfection and waiting for video calling feature

reply.author: Zinc, Inc.
reply.content: Thanks for the feedback, Vivek. The newest version of Cotap now supports calling, audio messages, and presence. You can find another user's presence status or call them by opening your existing conversation with them.

author: Heath Clayton
comment: I use Cotap all the time to mobilize my team for complex delivery of learning programs. It's awesome that I can use it in a secure environment and not worry.
title: Great for mobilizing a team

author: Sandy Sjoberg
comment: I enjoy this app. I can easily and quickly communicate with my co-workers.
title: Love it

author: Lewis Collins
comment: Great communication app

author: adogan1976
comment: Overagressive marketing. A colleague installed it and everyone got inviyes at work (weeks later). Do not share your credentials!
title: Spam

author: Chris Larson
comment: These ***holes keep spamming us constantly.   As soon as you install this,  it sends an email to ALL YOUR CONTACTS. Extremely deceptive and shady business techniques, hopefully they crash and burn.
title: Deceptive marketing and bad business practices

author: Niita Young
comment: Like it !
title: Liked it
